name: Charles Leclerc
introduction: Charles Marc Herv Perceval Leclerc (sharl LE-clair; born 16 October 1997, Monte Carlo, Monaco) is a Mongasque professional racing driver, currently driving in the 2022 FIA Formula One World Championship for Ferrari, after competing for Sauber in 2018.[2] A Ferrari Driver Academy member and reigning FIA Formula 2 Champion, Leclerc is one of the highest rated young drivers of the current era, who has previously tested for the Scuderia, Haas and 2018 employers Sauber.
